amendment.description: To provide funds for the Transportation Security Administration, United States Coast Guard, and the Office of State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness.

action.text: Amendment SA 3649 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3649 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 179.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3649 made in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3649.

Amendment SA 3649 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9196-9200, S9200-9202; text: CR S9167) To provide funds for the Transportation Security Administration, United States Coast Guard, and the Office of State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3649 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 179.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3649 proposed by Senator Byrd.
